translation.en: [Triss] You say this is all life is to you.
translation.zh: ‎你说你的生活有这些就行了

translation.en: I feel something out there waits for you.

translation.zh: ‎魔法就是把混沌能量组织起来
‎演示得很不错 谢谢你 芙琳吉拉

translation.en: There are mages who ignore their emotions…
translation.zh: ‎有的术士能够忽略自己的情绪

translation.en: -[yells] -…and then there are mages who are consumed by them.
translation.zh: ‎也有一些术士被自己的情绪吞噬

translation.en: It is your job to control Chaos,
[Giltine] There is a cost to all creation.

translation.zh: ‎白色头发 大个子 孤身一人…

translation.en: -We don't want your kind here, Witcher. -You mutant son of a bitch.
translation.zh:
‎-我们这里不欢迎你们这种人 猎魔人
‎-你这变异人

translation.en: You're the witcher, Geralt of Rivia.
translation.zh: ‎你是猎魔人 利维亚的杰洛特

translation.en: A job, I've got for you.

translation.zh: ‎无论是轻 还是重 ‎介于两者之间

translation.en: What if they come after you?
Because then, I am what they say I am.
translation.zh:
‎因为那样我就真变成
‎他们所说的怪物了

translation.en: The girl in the woods is your destiny.
[Jaskier] You have got a bit of an image problem.
[Jaskier] I won't be but silent backup.
[Istredd] Elves are the original sorcerers of the Continent.
Mages taught the first humans how to turn Chaos into magic.
translation.zh:
‎精灵术士教会第一批人类
‎如何将混沌能量变为魔法

translation.en: I was once Filavandrel of the Silver Towers.
translation.zh: ‎我曾经是银色之塔的菲拉凡德芮

translation.en: Show the humans that you are more than what they fear you to be.
[Geralt] This is where we part ways, Bard.
translation.zh: ‎该分道扬镳了 吟游诗人

translation.en: [Jaskier] I promised to change the public's tune about you.
-At least allow me to try. -[strums lute]
♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
[crowd joins in] ♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
♪ A friend of humanity ♪ Ah, thank you!
All I'm asking for is one night bodyguarding your best friend in the whole world.
translation.zh:
‎我只要求你
‎保护你全世界最好的朋友一晚上

translation.en: Can't have anyone finding out who you are.
-Geralt of Rivia, the mighty witcher! -[Jaskier] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: ‎利维亚的杰洛特 伟大的猎魔人！ ‎哎

translation.en: [Calanthe] Come, Witcher. Take a seat by my side.
translation.zh: ‎过来 猎魔人 坐我旁边

translation.en: [Mousesack] These suitors will vie all night for Princess Pavetta's hand.
translation.zh: ‎为了获得帕薇塔公主的青睐 ‎这些求婚者会争上一整个晚上

translation.en: I've come to claim your daughter's hand in marriage.
I saved your husband, King Roegner,
translation.zh: ‎我救了您的丈夫罗格纳国王

translation.en: I chose the Law of Surprise as payment.
[Eist] The Law of Surprise is as old as mankind itself.
translation.zh: ‎意外律和人类本身的历史同样悠久

translation.en: [Mousesack] When one has saved another from certain death…
translation.zh:
‎当一个人救了
‎原本必死的另一个人时…

translation.en: …the Law of Surprise can be claimed to pay that debt.
translation.zh: ‎…可以主张用意外律来还这笔债

translation.en: [Mousesack] Your blessing of this marriage has fulfilled a destiny.
translation.zh:
‎你对这段婚姻的祝福
‎已经满足了命运的要求

translation.en: You saved my life. I must repay you.
translation.zh: ‎你救了我的命 我必须报答你

translation.en: I claim the tradition as you have.
You're bound to this child whether you like it or not.
translation.zh:
‎你现在和这个孩子脱不了干系了
‎不论你喜不喜欢

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Alone.

translation.zh: ‎你好 多久没见了 几年？

translation.en: -What are you fishing for, exactly? -A djinn. I can't sleep.
translation.zh:
‎-你在捕什么？
‎-灯神 我睡不着

translation.en: Just maybe this has got something to do with the Law of Surprise, destiny.
translation.zh: ‎也许这与意外律及宿命有关

translation.en: Being unable to escape the child that belongs to you.
translation.zh:
‎-无法逃脱属于你的孩子
‎-不是！

translation.en: [Chireadan] But he needs a magical remedy.
-[Geralt] You must be the mage. -[Yennefer] Yennefer of Vengerberg.
translation.zh:
‎-你一定是那个术士吧
‎-温格堡的叶妮芙

translation.en: [Geralt] He was attacked by a djinn. -Fix it. -[Yennefer] A djinn?
translation.zh:
‎-他被灯神袭击了 治好他
‎-灯神？

translation.en: -Do you doubt my capabilities? -No. Just your intentions.
translation.zh:
‎-你怀疑我的能力？
‎-不是 只是怀疑你的意图罢了

translation.en: She wants to be the vessel.
-Dont! -You seem to want to meet your end.
You can have anything you want.
I woke up in that destroyed house, and you were gone.
translation.zh: ‎我在毁了的房子里醒来 ‎你已经走了

translation.en: A short while ago, a green dragon landed across the border
translation.zh:
‎不久之前 ‎聂达米尔国王的山里的边界附近
‎来了一条绿龙

‎聂达米尔国王的山里的边界附近
‎来了一条绿龙

translation.en: He's commissioned a hunt to kill it.
[Yennefer] I've walked this earth for decades
and then the first one I meet, I can't get rid of.
translation.zh: ‎头一次遇见一个 居然甩不掉了

translation.en: -What are you doing here, Yen? -I'm here for the dragon.
translation.zh:
‎-你来干嘛呢 阿叶？
‎-我为龙而来

translation.en: Do not tell me you've traveled all this way
translation.zh:
‎你大老远来
‎是为了用龙心恢复生育能力

translation.en: for made-up fertility cures using fresh dragon hearts.
-What could you want with a child? -[Yennefer] They took my choice.
translation.zh:
‎-你要孩子干什么？
‎-他们剥夺了我选择的权利

translation.en: [Geralt] The dwarves, they're leading us to a shorter path.
translation.zh: ‎那些矮人 他们要带我们走捷径

translation.en: Nilfgaard has returned burning through the south.
translation.zh: ‎尼弗迦德回来了 在南方大开杀戒

translation.en: They're inching closer by the day.
Won't be long till they try and take Cintra.
translation.zh: ‎过不了多久就会进攻并占领辛特拉

translation.en: [Yennefer] I can take care of myself.
[Yennefer] I was afraid that mountain would take you from me.
translation.zh: ‎我之前害怕山会把你从我身边带走

translation.en: -I'm not leaving till I kill that dragon. -Yen…
translation.zh:
‎-在杀死那条龙之前 我不会离开
‎-阿叶…

‎-能解决什么问题？
‎-能解决一切问题

translation.en: [Geralt] Did you always want to become a mother?
I dreamed of becoming important to someone.
translation.zh: ‎我想过 ‎做一个对别人很重要的人

translation.en: -The djinn. -That's why we can't escape each other.
I made that wish to save your life.
A child is no way to boost your fragile ego, Yen.
translation.zh:
‎不该通过孩子
‎来提高自己脆弱的自尊心 阿叶

translation.en: I'll take advice from you about children as soon as you take responsibility
translation.zh:
‎我可以接受你关于孩子的建议 ‎前提是你对许给你却被你抛弃的人
‎负起责任

translation.en: for the one you bound to you and then abandoned!
translation.zh:
‎前提是你对许给你却被你抛弃的人
‎负起责任

translation.en: [Borch] The sorceress will never regain her womb.
translation.zh: ‎女术士永远不会重新取得子宫

translation.en: And though you didn't want to lose her, Geralt, you will.
translation.zh:
‎杰洛特 虽然你不想失去她
‎但你还是会失去她

translation.en: [Geralt] You wanted to show me what I was missing.
translation.zh: ‎你想让我看到我在念想什么

‎-今天真不容易！
‎-哎 亚斯克尔！

translation.en: If life could give me one blessing,
it would be to take you off my hands!
You've come for your Child of Surprise.
Princess Cirilla has been raised by Calanthe since her parents died.
translation.zh:
‎希瑞菈公主的父母死后
‎一直由卡兰瑟抚养

translation.en: Pavetta and Duny's ship was lost at sea.
translation.zh: ‎帕薇塔和杜尼的船在海上沉没

translation.en: Have you been hiding your head in the sand?
Why do you think she's not safe?
[Geralt] I saw an army. A sea of black and gold.
translation.zh:
‎我看见一支军队
‎一片金色和黑色的海洋

translation.en: [Calanthe] Why would I give my only heir
translation.zh: ‎我为什么要把自己唯一的继承人

translation.en: to someone who never cared enough to come back for her?
translation.zh: ‎给一个从不回来关心她的人？

translation.en: Maybe that army won't come, and if they do, maybe you'll be ready.
translation.zh: ‎也许军队不会来 ‎如果来 也许你会作好准备

translation.en: But I'm here to protect the girl.
[Calanthe] Get him out of my sight.
The Nilfgaardian force crossed the Amell Pass.
translation.zh: ‎尼弗迦德军队穿过了阿梅尔山口

translation.en: Should we fall, your granddaughter will rule.
translation.zh:
‎要是我们对尼弗迦德战败
‎你外孙女将会执政

translation.en: -[man 1] Should be here! -[man 2] Find it immediately!
[Yennefer] How long do you see yourself here?
Because I may be missing you.
-Piss off. -I would, but we don't have much time.
translation.zh:
‎-走
‎-可以 但我们时间不多了

translation.en: She said you're the best student she ever taught.
translation.zh: ‎她说你是她教过最好的学生

translation.en: An emergency conclave of the Northern mages.
We can stop Nilfgaard, if we act now.
translation.zh: ‎如果现在采取行动的话 ‎我们可以阻止尼弗迦德

translation.en: Let them reap what they sow.
Vilgefortz and I and some others are going to fight.
translation.zh:
‎所以我和威戈佛特兹
‎还有其他一些人会继续斗争

translation.en: If I can bring him here…
-Geralt! -…to Ciri, destiny may yet side with us.
translation.zh:
‎杰洛特！ ‎…带到希瑞身边
‎宿命仍然可能站在我们这边

translation.en: -[Mousesack] He's gone. -[Lazlo] We must go, Highness.
translation.zh:
‎他不见了 ‎-我们得走了 殿下
‎-不！

translation.en: [soldier] Armies are not the way into Brokilon Forest.
translation.zh: ‎去布洛克莱昂森林不应该用军队

translation.en: -[Ciri] Mousesack, he helped raise me. -[Mousesack] No!
translation.zh:
‎-莫斯萨克帮忙养大了我
‎-不要！

translation.en: [sobs] You don't know what she is.
Cintran refugees, dead at least a week.
translation.zh: ‎辛特拉难民 死了至少一周了

translation.en: [Geralt] Come on, Roach. Back to Kaer Morhen.
-[Yennefer] We'll save the Continent? -[Triss] There are only 22 of us.
translation.zh: ‎我们是大陆的救世主？ ‎我们只有22人

translation.en: There's only one way for Nilfgaard to move north, through Sodden Hill.
translation.zh:
‎尼弗迦德向北进军只有一条路
‎穿过索登山

translation.en: [Tissaia] We have sent word to the Northern Kingdoms
to join us to defend their lands.
-[Yennefer] When is that? -[Vilgefortz] Within two days.

translation.zh:
‎-我受够你了
‎-莫斯萨克 住手！

translation.en: -[Dara] If I stay with you any longer… -Kill him.
I can't be there for you anymore.
[voices overlapping] The Time of the White Chill and the White Light is nigh.
The Time of Madness -and the Time of Contempt. -[screaming]
We're safer when we stick together.
translation.zh: ‎但我们团结在一起就会更安全

translation.en: [Yurga] Careful, now. You got bit, Butcher.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 你被咬了 屠夫

translation.en: [Sabrina] How is Nilfgaard's army here already?
translation.zh: ‎尼弗迦德军队怎么已经到了？

translation.en: [Vilgefortz] We can't wait for the Northern Kingdoms. We have to fight.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能等北方王国了 我们得战斗

translation.en: How far from your home to the battlefield? To Sodden?

translation.zh: ‎救大陆 ‎让你的混沌能量爆炸

translation.en: People linked by destiny will always find each other.
translation.zh: ‎被命运联系的人总能找到彼此
